messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Aurora
messages.msgSnippet: I ve seen them fairly often, fringe benefit of living in Canada.  When the solar storms were at their worst 11 years ago (they re on an 11 year cycle, we re at
messages.messageBody:
I've seen them fairly often, fringe benefit of living in Canada. When the solar storms were at their worst 11 years ago (they're on an 11 year cycle, we're at primo northern lights time again), a friend of mine and I drove far out of town to watch them. Not only could we see them, but we could hear them, they make a wierd humming, whining sound, kind of like a saw being played. There are lots of Dene and Innu stories about the lights and their sounds.

Allison
----- Original Message -----
From: Tami Labig-Duquette
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2001 9:17 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Aurora


We saw them too here in Indiana, very chilly brisk night :) I have only seen
them in Mass. and Conn. My sister who was raised in Texas had never seen
them, she was thrilled.
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi
Networking for Central Indiana unschoolers :)
http://communities.msn.com/ChildLedLearninginIndiana
Children Leading the Way!
http://ChildLedLearning-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
http://ChildEarthBasedLearning-subscribe@yahoogroups.com



----Original Message Follows----
From: Bridget E Coffman <rumpleteasermom@...>
Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Aurora
Date: Tue, 6 Nov 2001 10:07:03 -0500

I saw it in NE Ohio last night.

Bridget

> Subject: Re: Auroras
>
> I once saw the Aurora Borealis near Sopchoppy
> Florida!!!! about 30 miles south of Tallahassee, on
> the Gulf Coast!! It was "small" but so beautiful.
> Magenta to purple to orange to intense red. Saw them
> once before in the Yukon. Undulating, ethereal...made
> me feel as if I had been personally touched by the
> Creator.
>
> Sharon
>


^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
I don't suffer from insanity, I enjoy every minute of it.
